label: Karanovic, Tomislav & Kichoon Kim.  2014. New insights into polyphyly of the harpacticoid genus Delavalia (Crustacea, Copepoda) through morphological and molecular study of an unprecedented diversity of sympatric species in a small South Korean bay. Zootaxa 3783(1): 1–110.
value: Karanovic, Tomislav & Kichoon Kim.  2014. New insights into polyphyly of the harpacticoid genus Delavalia (Crustacea, Copepoda) through morphological and molecular study of an unprecedented diversity of sympatric species in a small South Korean bay. Zootaxa 3783(1): 1–110.
title: New insights into polyphyly of the harpacticoid genus Delavalia (Crustacea, Copepoda) through morphological and molecular study of an unprecedented diversity of sympatric species in a small South Korean bay
